components.contentHtml: view is the simplest container component. It can be used to encapsulate any number of children.
components.title: Simple Container Component

components.contentHtml: scroll is used to create a scrollable component.
components.title: Scrollable Container Component

components.contentHtml: text is used to create a component whose only content is text. It is useful for creating interpolated text and being able to style text nodes.
components.title: Text Component

components.contentHtml: button can be used to create clickable components.
components.title: Button Component

components.contentHtml:
input creates a text input component.

Properties

onChange
An event fired when string in the input is changed by the user
components.title: Input Component

components.contentHtml:
toggle creates a boolean toggle component.

Properties

value
Initial value of the toggle.
onChange
Event to call when the value changes.
components.title: Toggle Component

components.contentHtml:
image creates an image component. Alternatively, rawimage creates a raw image component.

Properties

source
Source of the image. Can be a url or the Texture2D object.
fit
Determines how to position the image inside the element.
components.title: Image Component
